description:
Nergal discovers that Uribatake has been embezzling funds and spending a lot of time with Hikaru. Yurika drags Akito along on a special investigation to find out just exactly what the chief engineer has been up to. Meanwhile, when Admiral Munetake discovers that he may be demoted, he`ll do anything to get back into the military’s good graces.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: It Was "a Reunion That Came Too Late"
